AD_AlchemicalWorkers.synopsis: Two alchemical workers ADing while working in the top floor of Felogyr's Fireworks.
AD_AlchemicalWorkers.how_to_trigger: Sneak up to the top floor of Felogyr's fireworks and observe the alchemical workers.

AdultCustomer.synopsis: Dialog with the halfling customer in Felogyr's Fireworks. Can give a little context to the shop without having to have all of it Avery's dialog.
AdultCustomer.how_to_trigger: Talk to the Halfling in the Fireworks House in CTY_Main_A near coords: 2, 16, -127

AD_BaniteWizard.synopsis: The Banite Wizard in the back workshop of the top floor of Felogyr's Fireworks is muttering to himself while he makes up alchemical explosives.
AD_BaniteWizard.how_to_trigger: Sneak up to the top floor of Felogyr's Fireworks and wait while the Wizard ADs.

AD_MiddleFloorWarning.synopsis: Warning AD if you have a torch or other burning item out on the middle floor of Felogyrs Fireworks.
AD_MiddleFloorWarning.how_to_trigger: On the middle floor of Felogyr's Fireworks, take out a torch.

Guard01.synopsis: Banite guard in the Fireworks House. Denies entry unless the players know and use the password "Uncle Felogyr", which can be learned as part of the Merchants House situation in WYR
Guard01.how_to_trigger: Speak to the guard at the bottom of the stairs in the Firework House in Lower City.

AD_AverySalesPitch.synopsis: AD for the Fireworks Shop Owner pitching his wares in the Fireworks shop in the Lower City.
AD_AverySalesPitch.how_to_trigger: Walk in to the Fireworks Shop near 13, 16, -127 in CTY_Main_A

BaniteWizard.synopsis: Dialog with the Banite wizard on the top level of the Fireworks House in the Lower City. He is the one making the Dead Man's switches for the Steelwatch Foundry.
BaniteWizard.how_to_trigger: Talk to the wizard on the top floor of the Fireworks House building in Lower City.

ChildCustomer.synopsis: Dialog for the child customer in the Fireworks House.
ChildCustomer.how_to_trigger: Talk to the child on the ground floor of the Fireworks House in CTY_Main_A near coords: 2, 16, -127

MiddleCheckpointWarning.synopsis: Checkpoint warning for S_LOW_FireworksHouse_BaniteGuard03 if players try and go behind the counter or up the stairs on the middle floor of the fireworks house.
MiddleCheckpointWarning.how_to_trigger: Use the debug book 6. Set Quest flags and options > 6. Act 3 (LOW) > 23. Fireworks House > 1. Knows password. Teleport to 13, 16, -127 in CTY_Main_A. Go in to twahe shop and talk to the guard on your right, use the password so he unlocks  the Vault door behind him. Go through the door and up the stairs. Try and go behind the counter at the top of the stairs and the warning will trigger.

AD_WorkerCombat.synopsis: Combat AD for one of the alchemical workers in the Fireworks House.
AD_WorkerCombat.how_to_trigger: Start a combat on the top floor of the Fireworks House.

AverySonshal.synopsis: Dialog for Avery Sonshal, tadpoled proprietor of Felogyr's Fireworks. Sells harmless fireworks, alchemical supplies, and maybe some grenades. Helpful to the players if he recognizes them as also tadpoled.
AverySonshal.how_to_trigger: Talk to Avery Sonshal on the ground floor of Felogyr's Fireworks in CTY_Main_A at about 0, 16, -127

Clerk02.synopsis: Simple dialog wih the Clerk on the middle floor of the Fireworks House. Is a trader for alchemical items and grenades.
Clerk02.how_to_trigger: Talk to the clerk on the middle level of the Fireworks House in Lower City.

Clerk01.synopsis: Clerk in the Lower City Fireworks House. Always hostile, so this is a one-liner if player manages to sneak in.
Clerk01.how_to_trigger: Speak to the Clerk in the top floor of the Fireworks House building

AD_ClerkTorch.synopsis: AD triggered by Avery in the Fireworks House if you walk in carrying a burning object or take out a burning object while on the ground floor of the shop.
AD_ClerkTorch.how_to_trigger: Walk in to the Fireworks House in CTY_Main_A carrying a torch.

Guard04.synopsis: One Liner from Banite Guard on the top floor of the Fireworks house if you talk to them while trespassing
Guard04.how_to_trigger: Sneak up somehow to the top floor, talk to the Banite Guard

BaniteGuard06.synopsis: One liner for if you initiate dialog with Banite Guard06 on the top floor of the Felogyr's Fireworks building. Always starts combat.
BaniteGuard06.how_to_trigger: Go invisible or otherwise sneak up on a guard and iniaitiate dialog

AD_ExplosionUpstairs.synopsis: Panicked AD of customers in Felogyr's Fireworks when one or more explosive barrels are detonated upstairs. Avery tries to calm them.
AD_ExplosionUpstairs.how_to_trigger: Explode any of the runepowder barrels on the middle or top floor of Felogyr's Fireworks

BaniteGuard07.synopsis: One liner for if you initiate dialog with Banite Guard07 on the top floor of the Felogyr's Fireworks building. Always starts a combat.
BaniteGuard07.how_to_trigger: Go invisible or otherwise sneak up on a guard and iniaitiate dialog

Guard05.synopsis: One Liner from Banite Guard on the top floor of the Fireworks house if you talk to them while trespassing
Guard05.how_to_trigger: Sneak up somehow to the top floor, talk to the Banite Guard

AD_TorchCombat.synopsis: Firework House in Lower City Combat AD for if the players keep walking around with torches out.
AD_TorchCombat.how_to_trigger: Walk in to the Fireworks House  in the Lower City with a torch out and wait until the guards attack.

Guard02.synopsis: One liner dialog for one of the guards on the ground floor of the Fireworks House in Lower City.
Guard02.how_to_trigger: Talk to the guard on the ground  floor of the Fireworks House in Lower city, next to Avery Sonschal.

AD_Warning.synopsis: ADs warning players to put out torches inside the Fireworks House, for obvious reasons.
AD_Warning.how_to_trigger: Go in to the ground floor of the Fireworks House in the Lower City with a torch equipped.

PAD_EnteringStore.synopsis: Karlach will start this VB when players enter the Fireworks House in Lower City.
PAD_EnteringStore.how_to_trigger: Entering to S_LOW_FireworksHouse_VB_ArrivalFireworksHouse_5eab1250-516d-4f7e-a4a6-c066b3619b3e with Karlach in the party.

Guard03.synopsis: One Liner from Banite Guard on the middle  floor of the Fireworks House.
Guard03.how_to_trigger: Gain access to the middle floor of the Fireworks House in CTY_Main_A, talk to the Banite Guard by the stairwell

AD_AlchemicalWorkers_2.speaker: Chymist Norffe
AD_AlchemicalWorkers_2.text: Pressure steady. Are we at temperature yet?

AD_AlchemicalWorkers_1.speaker: Limeburn Sphagwood
AD_AlchemicalWorkers_1.text: Maintaining temperature - steady at the mark.

AD_AlchemicalWorkers_3.speaker: Limeburn Sphagwood
AD_AlchemicalWorkers_3.text: Going to need to change out this barrel soon.

AD_AlchemicalWorkers_4.speaker: Chymist Norffe
AD_AlchemicalWorkers_4.text: Pipes are looking a little rusted - are we scheduled for maintenance?

AD_AlchemicalWorkers_0.speaker: Limeburn Sphagwood
AD_AlchemicalWorkers_0.text: Can't afford a failure on a critical pipe.

AD_AlchemicalWorkers_5.speaker: Chymist Norffe
AD_AlchemicalWorkers_5.text: Eh, not critical. Just a bastard if it breaks. Won't blow us up.

AdultCustomer_0.speaker: Robbin Datherswick
AdultCustomer_0.text: He's a bit of a genius isn't he? At sales, not fireworks. 'Course it helps to have the only licence in town to sell the stuff.

AdultCustomer_1.speaker: Robbin Datherswick
AdultCustomer_1.text: You'd think his business would suffer in winter at least, but it's booming all year round.

AD_BaniteWizard_1.speaker: Tomboldt the Pallid
AD_BaniteWizard_1.text: Where did I leave that blasted fire amber...?

AD_BaniteWizard_2.speaker: Tomboldt the Pallid
AD_BaniteWizard_2.text: There has to be a way to make this process quicker.

AD_BaniteWizard_4.speaker: Tomboldt the Pallid
AD_BaniteWizard_4.text: Steady, steady... Any spillage and they'll be picking my teeth out of the roof beams...

AD_BaniteWizard_5.speaker: Tomboldt the Pallid
AD_BaniteWizard_5.text: Where's an apprentice when you need one?

AD_BaniteWizard_0.speaker: Tomboldt the Pallid
AD_BaniteWizard_0.text: Done. ...Eight, nine, ten. Good. All fingers intact.

AD_MiddleFloorWarning_1.speaker: Feloguard Sigurd
AD_MiddleFloorWarning_1.text: Do you have a death wish? Put that out now!

Guard01_0.speaker: Feloguard Sigurd
Guard01_0.text: Employees only past this point. You wanna buy something, talk to Mr Sonshal.

Guard01_4.speaker: Feloguard Sigurd
Guard01_4.text: Ah! Right you are. Head on up then.

Guard01_3.speaker: Feloguard Sigurd
Guard01_3.text: Head on up. Your uncle is waiting for you upstairs.
Guard01_3.context: NodeContext: wink wink nudge nudge (there's no uncle)

Guard01_6.speaker: Feloguard Sigurd
Guard01_6.text: You still look like a customer to me, mate. Talk to Mr Sonshal.
Guard01_6.context: NodeContext: No nonsense; ever so slightly annoyed now

Guard01_9.speaker: Feloguard Sigurd
Guard01_9.text: Seen your uncle yet? Best not to keep him waiting.
Guard01_9.context: NodeContext: wink wink nudge nudge (there's no uncle)

AD_AverySalesPitch_0.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AD_AverySalesPitch_0.text: Missing a little light in your life? Felogyr's Fireworks will brighten your day!

AD_AverySalesPitch_1.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AD_AverySalesPitch_1.text: We've pyrotechnics, projectiles, crackers and sparklers, fire flowers, bottle rockets, and much, much more!

AD_AverySalesPitch_2.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AD_AverySalesPitch_2.text: Hosting a cobble party? We've got you covered! Red-rose torches for sale by the bunch!

AD_AverySalesPitch_3.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AD_AverySalesPitch_3.text: Just remember - once it's lit, you commit!

BaniteWizard_1.speaker: Tomboldt the Pallid
BaniteWizard_1.text: Smokepowder has a distinctive olfactory signature. The slightest variance is as detectable as a spark in the darkness.
BaniteWizard_1.context: NodeContext: Threatening (but also a little excited to do some killing)

ChildCustomer_0.speaker: Willow
ChildCustomer_0.text: That smokepowder smell - it smells so good.

ChildCustomer_1.speaker: Willow
ChildCustomer_1.text: When I've got my own money, I'm going to buy so many fireworks.

MiddleCheckpointWarning_0.speaker: Feloguard Maeve
MiddleCheckpointWarning_0.text: Ah ah - customers on the other side of the counter, please. Talk to the clerk if you want to buy something.
MiddleCheckpointWarning_0.context: NodeContext: 'ah ah' as in 'wait up there'

AverySonshal_42.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_42.text: You again. What do you want?

AverySonshal_71.speaker: Player
AverySonshal_71.text: I'm here to see Uncle Felogyr.

AverySonshal_67.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_67.text: He's upstairs. Only one floor up, mind.

AverySonshal_80.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_80.text: Faces. Hands. And eyebrows. How do we protect them?

AverySonshal_122.speaker: Willow
AverySonshal_122.text: Watch for wind direction. Put on your gloves. Aaaaaand... alight at arm's length!

AverySonshal_32.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_32.text: And what does Uncle Felogyr always say?

AverySonshal_61.speaker: Willow
AverySonshal_61.context: NodeContext: chanted, pleased like a teacher's pet answering a question

AverySonshal_29.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_29.text: Excellent! Now remember - Felogyr's Fireworks accepts no liability for singed nails, toasted eyelashes, loss of limbs, scalded torsos, or blown-off heads.
AverySonshal_29.context: NodeContext: Uplifting, as if these weren't horrible side effects of having your face blown off by fireworks. Paced like a Terms and Conditions section of a radio ad.

AverySonshal_116.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_116.text: Now - you there. What can I do for you?

AverySonshal_120.speaker: Narrator
AverySonshal_120.text: *You feel an all-too-familiar squirm in the recesses of your mind. He has a tadpole.*

AverySonshal_129.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_129.text: A-ha! A fellow friend of Gortash! Praise the Absolute.

AverySonshal_5.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_5.text: I have a special sample, available just for you, if you wish.

AverySonshal_62.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_62.text: This one will be very useful against any and all enemies of Gortash. Be sure to be clear of its explosion area.
AverySonshal_62.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mindmeld FX/no lipsyncNodeContext: deathly serious

AverySonshal_55.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_55.text: Please enjoy responsibly! And nowhere near this establishment. Is there anything else I can do for you?

AverySonshal_47.speaker: Player
AverySonshal_47.text: What else do you do for Lord Gortash?

AverySonshal_97.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_97.text: What else? I don't know what you mean. We're purveyors of smokepowder.

AverySonshal_9.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_9.text: Anything that can be lit, flamed, or fired up! Smokepowder is a beautiful mistress, she will not be limited to one form, and she is quite malleable in the right hands.

AverySonshal_0.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_0.text: What are you really asking, friend of Gortash?
AverySonshal_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mindmeld FX/no lipsyncNodeContext: with an unexpected edge of intimidation

AverySonshal_18.speaker: Player
AverySonshal_18.text: I'll take that free sample now, please.

AverySonshal_106.speaker: Player
AverySonshal_106.text: Recall the merchant's password. 'Uncle Felogyr sent me.'

AverySonshal_34.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_34.text: A-ha! You must be Arfur's friend.

AverySonshal_91.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_91.context: NodeContext: a harsh whisper, NOT A MINMELD, spoken out loud

AverySonshal_41.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_41.text: Yes yes, he's just upstairs. But only one flight - if you get to the top, you've gone too far.
AverySonshal_41.context: NodeContext: verbal equivalent of teasingly wagging a finger (and secretly meaning it when you're warning someone)

AverySonshal_96.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_96.text: (Browse as irresponsibly as you like. Just don't tell the other customers.)
AverySonshal_96.context: NodeContext: whispered, just to the player, conspirationally

AverySonshal_2.speaker: Player
AverySonshal_2.text: What do you have for sale?

AverySonshal_98.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_98.text: Oh! Well why didn't you say so?

AverySonshal_39.speaker: Player
AverySonshal_39.text: Gortash sent me to check on your latest order.

AverySonshal_23.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_23.text: I see... Then he must not have received my update.

AverySonshal_83.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_83.text: You may bring this message to him - everything is right on schedule. The next batch will be dispatched within a tenday.

AverySonshal_8.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_8.text: Exceptional quality, if I do say so myself. The Gondians will know it when they see it.

AverySonshal_110.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_110.text: I believe that concludes this purchase order. We very much appreciate Lord Gortash's continued honouring of our humble establishment with his custom.

AverySonshal_43.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_43.text: He's done nothing of the kind. I have his latest order in my pocket. And he already has his update on its progress.

AverySonshal_94.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_94.text: I know this because I delivered it to him myself.

AverySonshal_6.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_6.text: Which begs the question - what business do you have masquerading as a servant of Lord Gortash?

AverySonshal_92.speaker: Player
AverySonshal_92.text: Just testing you. I'm interested in browsing your wares.

AverySonshal_85.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_85.text: I understand. We can't be too careful.

AverySonshal_58.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_58.text: Remember - once it's lit, you commit!

AverySonshal_10.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_10.text: And if it's not a firework - do whatever you like.

AverySonshal_52.speaker: Player
AverySonshal_52.text: I was just being nosy. Sorry.

AverySonshal_127.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_127.text: Remember - face, hands, eyebrows. And once it's lit, you commit!
AverySonshal_127.context: NodeContext: abruptly cheerful in sales patter mode

AverySonshal_77.speaker: Player
AverySonshal_77.text: Masquerading? Don't you recognise a servant of Gortash when you see one?

AverySonshal_59.speaker: Player
AverySonshal_59.text: Careful - my magic can be quite unpredictable, and I'd hate to see this place go up in flames.

AverySonshal_63.speaker: Player
AverySonshal_63.text: How DARE you? I am exactly who I proclaim to be!

AverySonshal_12.speaker: Player
AverySonshal_12.text: Question me again and your body will never be found.

AverySonshal_131.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_131.text: Sorry. Sorry sorry sorry! Please. Don't tell your master I doubted you.

AverySonshal_117.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_117.text: We value his custom immensely, and the services of all those in his employ!

AverySonshal_81.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_81.text: Please - take this. On the house.
AverySonshal_81.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Off-screen: hands us an item. 
Mindmeld FX/no lipsync

AverySonshal_109.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_109.text: Er... please, enjoy the store. If there's anything I can help with, do not hesitate to ask.
AverySonshal_109.context: NodeContext: a little quivery, afraid he misstepped

AverySonshal_22.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_22.text: I don't know what kind of covert operative you are, but you are a threat to all that is good in this city.

AverySonshal_16.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_16.text: Now get out of my sight.
AverySonshal_16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mindmeld FX/no lipsyncNodeContext: viciously hissed

AverySonshal_11.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_11.text: And for gods' sakes have a little discretion.
AverySonshal_11.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mindmeld FX/no lipsyncNodeContext: abruptly terse

AverySonshal_26.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_26.text: That is no answer at all.

AverySonshal_27.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_27.text: If you are some sort of covert operative, you're a bad one.

AverySonshal_70.speaker: Player
AverySonshal_70.text: Your latest order is late. Gortash demands to know why.

AverySonshal_69.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_69.text: Forgive me - I did not know I had kept Gortash's humble servant waiting.

AverySonshal_19.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_19.text: Has he, now? Then the latest update I sent did not arrive?

AverySonshal_30.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_30.text: I assure you that is quite impossible. I delivered it myself.

AverySonshal_64.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_64.text: Tell me, what form will you have her in today?

AverySonshal_104.speaker: Player
AverySonshal_104.text: Whatever form best pleases Uncle Felogyr.

AverySonshal_31.speaker: Player
AverySonshal_31.text: Let's see what you have in stock.

AverySonshal_125.speaker: Player
AverySonshal_125.text: Not in the mood for fireworks right now. Perhaps another time.

AverySonshal_130.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_130.text: Not a bother! Enjoy the shop.

AverySonshal_60.speaker: Player
AverySonshal_60.text: Recall the password. 'Uncle Felogyr sent me'.

AverySonshal_45.speaker: Player
AverySonshal_45.text: Can I see what you have for sale?

AverySonshal_86.speaker: Player
AverySonshal_86.text: No. I'll just be on my way.

AverySonshal_101.speaker: Player
AverySonshal_101.text: Is it really fireworks you sell to Gortash, or...?

AverySonshal_73.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_73.text: Oh, we trade in all sorts.

AverySonshal_3.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_3.text: Heavens no! I'm just the humble proprietor. Avery Sonshal, at your service. Descendant of the great Felogyr Sonshal.

AverySonshal_100.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_100.text: But you can call me Felogyr if you like. Helps spread the brand, see.
AverySonshal_100.context: NodeContext: conspirational and whimsical, like a verbal tap on the nose har har this is a lovely secret between us isn't it?

AverySonshal_14.speaker: Player
AverySonshal_14.text: I'd like to see what you have for sale.

AverySonshal_93.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_93.text: Have you tried the Lantanese candles?

AverySonshal_4.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_4.text: Or perhaps the delicate simplicity of a perfectly crafted torch is more to your taste?

AverySonshal_118.speaker: Player
AverySonshal_118.text: I'm here to visit Uncle Felogyr. He sent me, if you catch my drift.

AverySonshal_126.speaker: Player
AverySonshal_126.text: You mentioned Gortash when we first met - do you work with him?

AverySonshal_115.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_115.text: Oh heavens, no, not with him. I work for him. As I do for all of my most loyal customers.

AverySonshal_107.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AverySonshal_107.text: Fabulously charismatic man though. Tips well.

AverySonshal_36.speaker: Player
AverySonshal_36.text: I'm not sure yet. Can I see what you have for sale?

Clerk02_7.speaker: Clerk Tamara
Clerk02_7.text: Back for more of Uncle Felogyr's finest, are you?

Clerk02_10.speaker: Clerk Tamara
Clerk02_10.text: Another friend of Felogyr? All right. Just remember the top floor's off-limits, password or not.
Clerk02_10.context: NodeContext: A little weary; wasn't expecting someone else up here yet

Clerk02_2.speaker: Clerk Tamara
Clerk02_2.text: Looking to buy a little something extra, then?
Clerk02_2.context: NodeContext: A little conspiratorial (but still a bit tired of all this extra work)

Clerk02_1.speaker: Clerk Tamara
Clerk02_1.text: That could not be less of your business.

Clerk02_12.speaker: Player
Clerk02_12.text: I know the signs of an illegal hustle. Why don't you just tell me what's going on?

Clerk02_6.speaker: Player
Clerk02_6.text: I smell the crackle and fire and power. What exactly is going on upstairs?

Clerk02_9.speaker: Clerk Tamara
Clerk02_9.text: Smokepowder in its earthier forms. For purists only.
Clerk02_9.context: NodeContext: Matter of fact - but also keen to point out his merch is worth it

Clerk02_11.speaker: Clerk Tamara
Clerk02_11.text: Don't jostle any of the merchandise on your way out.
Clerk02_11.context: NodeContext: Pointed warning; doesn't want anything to explode

Clerk01_0.speaker: Limeburn Sphagwood
Clerk01_0.text: What the - you're not supposed to be here!

AD_ClerkTorch_0.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AD_ClerkTorch_0.text: You! Are you mad? Put that flame out!
AD_ClerkTorch_0.context: NodeContext: Angry/concerned that the player going to blow up the entire fireworks shop

Guard04_0.speaker: Chymist Norffe
Guard04_0.text: You ain't supposed to be here, now, are you?

BaniteGuard06_0.speaker: Fist of Bane Hyrriet
BaniteGuard06_0.text: This ain't a place you want to be skulking around.
BaniteGuard06_0.context: NodeContext: grim and looking forward to the beating you're about to deliver - caught player sneaking around, and about to attack

AD_ExplosionUpstairs_0.speaker: Robbin Datherswick
AD_ExplosionUpstairs_0.text: Gods, what kind of firework was that?

AD_ExplosionUpstairs_1.speaker: Avery Sonshal
AD_ExplosionUpstairs_1.text: Where there is innovation, there may be a few backfires - it's all part of the process!
AD_ExplosionUpstairs_1.context: NodeContext: Trying to reassure his customers despite the explosion upstairs

BaniteGuard07_0.speaker: Fist of Bane Volgu Drak
BaniteGuard07_0.text: I like trespassers - I like the sounds they make when I break their bones.

Guard05_0.speaker: Black Gauntlet Uva
Guard05_0.text: You are not permitted to be here!

Guard02_0.speaker: Feloguard Liadan
Guard02_0.text: Any torches, matches, wizards, or other sources of open flame, keep them unlit, please.

Guard02_1.speaker: Feloguard Liadan
Guard02_1.text: Mephits are allowed, but only the non-magma kind.

PAD_EnteringStore_0.speaker: Player
PAD_EnteringStore_0.text: Oof. Karlach and explosives, not a good mix.

PAD_EnteringStore_2.speaker: Player
PAD_EnteringStore_2.text: Confounding inventions. Who can take joy in something that terrifies animals?

Guard03_0.speaker: Feloguard Maeve
Guard03_0.text: Oh, you should not be up here.

Guard03_1.speaker: Feloguard Maeve
Guard03_1.text: Look, either you came to buy things from Tamara, or you really don't understand how shops work.
Guard03_1.context: NodeContext: Still firm, but relenting slightly; trying to get the player off their back

Guard03_2.speaker: Feloguard Maeve
Guard03_2.text: Employees only past here. If you're expecting any packages, they'll bring them down to you.
